jobDescription: Marketing Statistician ? Experience Needed  ? Strong marketing analytics statistical modeling experience needed: Experience in modeling against time series, and cluster development, providing predictive analytics, as well as marketing impact, ROI and overall efficiency.  ? History of working with marketing data from a variety of sources and channels and ability to interpret each  ? Ability to work with big data and complex datasets  ? This individual will need to partner with development, data science, and client performance group to understand data sources, client needs and then both independently and collaboratively apply data analysis and statistical methodologies to marketing and customer data, including but not limited linear and non-linear regression analyses, cluster analyses, principal component analysis, time series, survival models, and experimental designs using R, Python and other statistical software  ? Knowledge of machine learning to deploy what if analyses and predictive models  ? Ability to produce client-ready output which translates statistical modeling and outputs into marketing language which is accessible across levels and job functions  If interested please email resumes to Lenny.Demo@rht.com
